metadata.description: NOTE: racial slurs. Librivox v1. Tom & his friend Huckleberry Finn have the kinds of adventures many boys can imagine: racing bugs during class, impressing girls, especially Becky Thatcher, with fights and stunts in the schoolyard, getting lost in a cave, and playing pirates on the Mississippi River. One of the most famous incidents in the book describes how Tom persuades his friends to do a boring, hateful chore for him: whitewashing (i.e., painting) a fence.

translation.web_share_player_not_found_heading: Uh oh, I’ve got a bad feeling about this...

translation.web_share_player_sharing_paused_desc: We’ve frozen this link because it may be breaking our <1>sharing policy</1>. The playlist’s creator can email hello@yotoplay.com to request a manual review.
